author: Gemini 2.5 Pro
beta: Practice outside flagging as you traverse from right to left and upward. Keep your hips close to the wall and use your free leg to balance when reaching across to the next hold. Focus on controlled, balanced movements.

author: Gemini 2.5 Pro
beta: Practice matching hands on the same hold while gradually moving upward. Try to keep three points of contact as you match and push through your legs to stand tall. Finish close to the top for a sense of accomplishment.

author: Gemini 2.5 Pro
beta: Focus on using the backstep position by turning your hip toward the wall as you move upward and diagonally. This will help you conserve energy and maintain good balance. The finish is high to encourage a full extension.
